text: Cythara citharoedus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Mangeliidae.Worldwide Mollusk Species Data Base: Cythara caimitica This species is considered a nomen dubium. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * ==External links== * Tucker, J.K. 2004 Catalog of recent and fossil turrids (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Zootaxa 682:1-1295. citharoedus Category:Gastropods described in 1802
title: Cythara citharoedus
